item.description:
Our April gathering at the Boston Sail Loft was a huge success with over 50 members attending from both Mass Boating Crew Finder and Boston Sailing Meetup.

Let's do it again!

Come raise a glass, meet crew and skippers, and start making plans for the summer. Whether you're an old salt or a landlubber, come mingle and learn about the great boating options available in the Charles River, Boston Harbor and other coastal regions. This event has no formal agenda or "meeting", just mingling and making connections.

See you there!

Mary
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be gathered by the bar
item.name: Let's Have Some Drinks and Plan for the Summer!
